content:
{"name": "ABCD Roxbury/North Dorchester Neighborhood Opportunity Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call (617) 442-5900 first to schedule apt.
Closed on the Last Wednesday of each month. Closed on the 1st and 3rd Thursday of each month.
* Offer a wide variety of baby care services
* teenage services and care also available
* Back to school care for school going kids
* Offer food delivery services for seniors every end of the month after they have registered.
* cradles to crayons services available
* Ask on more services upon arrival", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "565 Warren Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Roxbury", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02121", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.3125604, "longitude": -71.0835286}, "phones": [{"number": "(617) 442-5900", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Requires ID for adults and birth certificates for children in the household"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Completed application"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers available (must bring birth certificate)"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Baby formula may be available"}]}
